verses.name: 2 Corinthians 2:8
verses.text: Wherefore I beseech you that ye would confirm your love toward him.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 2:9
verses.text: For to this end also did I write, that I might know the proof of you, whether ye be obedient in all things.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 2:10
verses.text: To whom ye forgive any thing, I forgive also: for if I forgave any thing, to whom I forgave it, for your sakes forgave I it in the person of Christ;

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 2:11
verses.text: Lest Satan should get an advantage of us: for we are not ignorant of his devices.
